section.45: The Book of Oaths (qasamah), Retaliation and Blood Money

hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Amr bin Shu'aib, from his father, that his grandfather said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'The blood money of a woman (in the event of injury) is like the blood money of a man, up to one-third of the Diyah (for her life)
